name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Arcade Attack
summary: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Arcade Attack pits the four Ninja Turtle brothers against their old nemesis, Shredder, and his many villainous henchmen. The game features a combination system that enables players to string together uppercuts and roundhouse kicks to unlock a series of moves powerful enough to take out even the strongest enemy. The game also includes a cooperative mode, allowing for arcade action with either a friend via local wireless, or a system-controlled Turtle brother.
info:
• 中文名: 忍者神龟：冲击
